title: Great for gist baskets

review_data: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on April 1, 2023
name: Joy
title: Adjustable
review: Purchased the product after using it at a friend's house. Kids were able to sit further away from the fire, because of the adjustability of the forks. Easy clean up. Nice to be able to place them in a bag between uses.Very nice product. Great price.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on April 1, 2023
name: Tammy
title: Very flimsy
review: Although this product says “Marshmallow Roaster” I thought I was buying what I already had. Old one on the left, new on the right. The one on the right is what I call sturdy.Several reviews said these were sturdy and I’m baffled by this. I’m sure they’d hold a marshmallow, but they are super flimsy. About as sturdy as if you’d unraveled a wire coat hanger and used a single strand of wire. The only benefit is you could cook 2 of them with this? I bought this thinking I could cook hotdogs and brats like I do with my old one, but these wouldn’t hold one up. If you only plan on cooking marshmallows which are mostly air, they’ll probably be fine.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on February 27, 2023
name: LoveMyLife
title: Telescopic handles make these easy to use and easier to store.
review: Perfect for the outdoor firepit, these are well made, with nice comfort grips and reusable silicone tips to cover the sharp ends.Telescopic handles make these easy to use and easier to store. Come in a nice zipper pouch for storage.

title: Awesome!
review: We have been using these to roast marshmallows in our fireplace. I love them! They keep my fingers form burning.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on January 19, 2023
name: Searcher
title: Great roasting sticks
review: I was sooooo happy to find these on Amazon.We had the other variation for years (narrower, designed to roast wieners) and so I was thrilled to find these that have the forks further apart and are ideal for marshmallow roasting.
